name: Arabasta Desert

keyEvents.description: Scorpion confronts Ace in the desert, claiming to have defeated Blackbeard
Ace battles Scorpion using various combat techniques
A landslide threatens Scorpion and his sons in the rocky desert terrain
Ace gives Luffy his Vivre Card before departing into the desert

description: The vast desert region of Arabasta where the Straw Hat crew travels toward Alubarna. The harsh environment features heat hazes, rocky outcrops, and dangerous terrain including areas prone to landslides.
notes: This episode takes place in the desert during the Straw Hats' journey to Alubarna. The desert's heat haze gives the episode its title and creates atmospheric conditions for Ace's confrontation with Scorpion.
